About

Cristiano Medeiros Dalbem
Porto Alegre, RS. Brazil
Email: cmdalbem [at] inf.ufrgs.br
GTalk: ninja.dalbem [at] gmail.com


On this website you'll find a selection of my best works and projects done during my academic life studying Computer Science at UFRGS (Universidade Federal do Rio Grande do Sul). I've been there since 2008 and I'm still getting surprised every day by how vast, diverse and interesting the world of information technology is.
You can also check my updated Curriculum Vitae and my Online Lattes CV.
Unfortunately, for now, you'll find english translation only for this main page, but if you are curious about any of my projects feel free to contact me in english.
